RangeDeleteContents.summary:
The Range.deleteContents() method removes the contents of
the from the .

remarks.para: In the context of a , when a node is partially selected—meaning it overlaps with the start or end of the selection—only the selected portion of the text is deleted, while the node itself remains intact. However, if a node is fully selected, the entire node and its contents are removed.

Unlike , this method does not return a
containing the deleted content.
